pme.ai.fhe.de.studybuddy.fragments

Class LineChartFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • pme.ai.fhe.de.studybuddy.fragments.LineChartFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.arch.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, android.arch.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class LineChartFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
    The class handles a fragment, which creates a line with userspecific data out of the database. It shows the credit points the user reached every semester compared with the count of credits he should have

      • loadLineChart

        private void loadLineChart()
        The function loadLineChart is called when the view of the fragment is created. It loads the data out of the database and sets all configurations for the chart.
